description.value:
Thalamra uses eldritch blast twice or makes two unarmed strikes.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 1d10 + @mod type=force average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] casts [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 4 bludgeoning average=false]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Dark Devotion. Thalamra has advantage on saving throws against being &Reference[charmed]{charmed} or &Reference[frightened]{frightened}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Devil’s Sight. Thalamra can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, out to a distance of 120 feet.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

When Thalamra is damaged by a creature within 60 feet of her that she can see, the creature that damaged her is engulfed in hellish flames and must make a [[/save dex 14 format=long]], taking [[/damage 3d10 type=fire average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.
